name: kart kids (itch)
description:
A chaotic racing game inspired by Re-Volt, featuring tons of tiny RC cars that race in the local neighborhood.

The cars push eachother a lot so it can get quite messy! Also contains local co-op for 2 players, so you can play it with a friend or foe.

Features

  • Up to 60 cars
  • Cool physics
  • 2 player local co-op
  • Controller support

Keyboard

  • ARROW KEYS & WASD - move
  • L & E - jump
  • J & Q - honk

Controller

  • LEFT STICK - steer
  • A & B - move forward/backward
  • LEFT BUMPER - honk
  • RIGHT BUMPER - jump
Current Sokpop Collection

Join the 3$ Sokpop Patreon now to get this game, and our previous game Penguin Park 3D, immediately!
